scripts.build: slidev build --base /slides/denuvo/ && shx echo "AuthType Basic" > ./dist/.htaccess && shx echo "AuthName \"Protected Area\"" >> ./dist/.htaccess && shx echo "AuthUserFile /home/momo/web/momo5502.com/public_html/.htpasswd" >> ./dist/.htaccess && shx echo "Require valid-user" >> ./dist/.htaccess && shx echo "ErrorDocument 404 /slides/denuvo/404.html" >> ./dist/.htaccess
